item.title: Cuckoo 3 Installation Guide
item.description: In this blogpost, I’ll share my notes on the installation of the Cuckoo 3 Sandbox. Cuckoo is the leading open source automated malware analysis system. It is used to launch malware in a secure and isolated environment. Thanks to folks at Hatching and CERT-EE, we now have a full rewrite of Cuckoo in Python 3! You can find their original setup instructions on the official Estonian CERT repo here .
